eiEAM 0.1
  • Reference

    Combine DF's across pacing directions within a timepoint

    combine_rds_pacing_dir_v2.Rd

    Combine DF's across pacing directions within a timepoint

    combine_rds_pacing_dir_v2(
  id,
  df,
  grouping,
  base_dir = "data/",
  suffix = "_full",
  step,
  timepoint,
  wavefront
)

    Arguments

    id

    Subject id

    df

    Data frame containing data from the pacing direction that you want to merge

    grouping

    "carto_mesh" or "lv_volt" or other group that you've filtering within

    base_dir

    Directory where you're saving this data to

    suffix

    Any suffix you want to add to the data file name, name looks like step2_t2_rvpaced_full.rds

    step

    What step in your process are you in?

    timepoint

    The timepoint that you're currently working with

    wavefront

    The pacing wavefront that you're currently merging in

    Value

    Creates a file in wherever we declared our base_dir

    Contents
